body:
@adg 
I see "ZZ" at work:
```bash
$ curl http://country-test.golang.org/
"ZZ"

# and "RU" while using ipv4:
$ curl http://country-test.golang.org/ -4
"RU"
```
On my 6to4 machine `RU` for both ipv6 and ipv4, and on VDS is both `ZZ` (and 403 for both ipv4 and ipv6 addr while trying to `GET https://play.golang.org/p/puYYXUdiQl` ).
